Description: Powerful digital marketing platform letting you connect to customers in a whole new way.
Name: Salesforce Marketing Cloud

Methods.Name: Add Subscribers To List
Methods.Description: Adds subscribers to the specified list.

Methods.Name: Check Subscription
Methods.Description: Checks if a contact exists by data extension external key.

Methods.Name: Send Transactional Email
Methods.Description: Sends transactional email using Marketing Cloud's triggered send functionality. In order to use this service, configure a triggered send definition in Email Studio.

Methods.Name: Upsert Data Extension Rows By Key
Methods.Description: Creates or updates a batch of data extensions rows by key.

Methods.Name: Upsert Custom Data Extension Rows
Methods.Description: Creates or updates a batch of data extension rows. Custom fields must be provided for both the request and response objects.

Methods.Name: Insert Data Extension Rows By ID
Methods.Description: Creates or updates a batch of data extensions rows by ID. We have provided some optional sample keys and values, you can add your own to the request in the format [].keys.mykey and [].values.myvalue. You can also map the key in the response [].keys.mykey.

Methods.Name: Search Contacts
Methods.Description: Finds specified contacts based on provided attributes.

Methods.Name: Create Contact
Methods.Description: Creates a new contact with the specified information in the specified attribute groups.

Methods.Name: Update Contact
Methods.Description: Updates a contact with the specified information in the specified attribute groups.

Methods.Name: Fire The Event
Methods.Description: Fires the entry event that initiates the journey. Properties of the event can be added as custom request fields e.g. "Data.accountNumber".
